description:
I created this course for people who don’t have a lot of time on their hands and who want to get to the heart of the matter when it comes to Facebook marketing. Whether you are a beginner or an expert, after these 90 concise minutes, you will be creating one successful Facebook advertising campaign after the other.

This course is really made up of 2 parts. In the first half of the course, I teach you everything I knew of Facebook advertising when I started, what I learned along the way and much more! Included:

  • How the auction system is setup
  • How Facebook’s ad structure is composed of 3 levels
  • How you can manage and analyze your ads once they are running or have finished running
  • A comprehensive look at the different possible bidding setups
  • How Power Editor as of October 2015 is the best tool to use in order to create your Facebook ads
  • Custom and Lookalike audiences
  • How to use Page Insights to refine the content you promote
  • How to analyze the data from your advertising campaigns
  • And much more…

Then, I show you step-by-step how I created thousands of my ad campaigns, which have produced:

  • 40 million page views
  • $40,000
  • 500,000 Facebook fans
  • CPCs of $0.001
  • Relevance scores of 10/10

Finally, in the second half of the course, I delve into how you can do it. There are specific lectures on how to apply my Facebook advertising secrets for:

  • Start-ups
  • Small businesses
  • Online stores
  • Video-centered businesses

Start now and learn in 90 minutes everything I did in 6 months! Included

  • 30-day money back guarantee: I am confident in the quality of my course ahead, but if you ever feel like it does not fulfill your expectations, you can ask for 100% of your money back within 30 days
  • Full & free lifetime access
  • Every new lecture I add will always be included for free
  • Free of charge surprise bonuses in the future

Do not waste another minute in becoming a Facebook marketing expert!
title: Facebook Marketing: Become a FB Ads Expert in 90 Mins 2015
